blocks.headline: TinaCMS: The perfect CMS for the JamStack
blocks.text: Build your site your way, using a headless CMS that reads/writes to markdown/mdx/json files.

blocks.content:
## Transform your Jamstack development with TinaCMS

Break free from the constraints of monolithic CMS. TinaCMS provides a flexible, file-based approach that developers love.

items.headline: File-Based CMS
items.text: TinaCMS reads and writes directly to markdown/mdx/json files, providing you with a versatile headless CMS.

items.headline: Empowered Development
items.text: TinaCMS lets you build your site exactly how you want, without being tied down to a monolithic CMS.

items.headline: Local Development
items.text: Run TinaCMS locally for an unparalleled developer experience.

items.headline: Markdown and MDX Support
items.text: TinaCMS seamlessly integrates with Markdown and MDX, perfect for your Jamstack projects.

items.headline: Open-Source
items.text: Benefit from an open-source project with an active community and constant improvements.

items.headline: No Vendor Lock-In
items.text: Avoid the pitfalls of vendor lock-in. Enjoy the flexibility to switch or adapt your technology stack whenever you need.

blocks.headline: Ready to revolutionize your Jamstack development?

seo.title: Jamstack CMS
seo.description: Supercharge your Jamstack projects with TinaCMS. Enjoy a flexible, file-based headless CMS and liberate your site from monolithic systems.
